text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..1ExtensionMedication repeat information
extension 0..*ExtensionSlice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsAllowed 0..1ExtensionNumber of repeat prescriptions authorised
url 1..1uri"numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsAllowed"
value[x] 1..1unsignedIntNumber of repeat prescriptions authorised
extension:numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsIssued 0..1ExtensionNumber of repeat prescriptions issued
url 1..1uri"numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsIssued"
value[x] 0..1unsignedIntNumber of repeat prescriptions issued
extension:authorisationExpiryDate 0..1ExtensionRepeat prescription review date
url 1..1uri"authorisationExpiryDate"
value[x] 0..1dateTimeRepeat prescription review date
url 1..1uri"https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/Extension-UKCore-MedicationRepeatInformation"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: ExtensionUKCoreMedicationRepeatInformation
title: Extension UK Core Medication Repeat Information
description: Indicates the specific repeat information of a medication item.

element.definition: Medication repeat information.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
